According to Kamala, those who believe “Christ is King” should not attend her rallies, as she claims she’s more popular.

“Oh you guys are at the wrong rally, no, I think you meant to go to the smaller one down the street,” said Harris, as she mocked the attendee who yelled, “Christ is King.”

This is why it’s no surprise that photos resurfaced of her partying with the Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence, as the only bigotry allowed among leftists is against Christians.
title: Kamala Harris does NOT want you to see the video of her partying with anti-Catholic drag nuns

title: The 5 Tiers of Stolen Elections

description:
SIX DAYS to Election 2024 | We are gearing up for our Election Livestream of the Century: The Rumble on Rumble, November 5th at 6PM ET

We will simul-stream with Dan Bongino, Piers Morgan, Russell Brand, Patrick Bet-David, Tim Pool, and other high-profile guests!

We will remain live until the election is called, potentially lasting days or weeks.

As we get prepared, we hope you will enjoy a glimpse behind the curtain, from our special docuseries covering the real behind the scenes at Louder with Crowder, Steven’s early morning routine and how we make the doughnuts every day for our beloved Mug Club.
title: Making the Daily Show: Election 2024 Docuseries Part 1 | Louder With Crowder

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

What a horrible week for a presidential campaign surrogate to make an unforced error insulting a key electorate. And right after a major speech by a presidential candidate, too. Sucks to be Kamala Harris, who, after her closing argument, now needs to clean up her campaign calling half of America garbage. The rub is that instead of a comedian saying it... it was the PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES. Joe Biden? Remember that guy?

To make matters worse, Trump was giving a rally at the same time and was able to respond instantaneously to the breaking news. There's a
title: Marco Rubio interrupts Trump speech with breaking news of insult Biden just called half of America
